entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 7.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the morning. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
